Name: rPi1
audio recording settings:
arecord,
        -D, card_device, 
        -c, 1, 	#mono audio
        -r, 90000, #sample rate
        -f, S16_LE,	# Audio format
        -d, str(Rec_time), #Recording duration in seconds
        audio_file	#output .wav file
video conversion settings:
ffmpeg,
        -i, h264_video_file,  # Input file
        -r, 45, # Framerate
        -c:v, libx264,  # Video codec
        -crf, 28,  # CRF value for compression
        -preset, fast,  # compression-efficiency tradeoff
        -f, mp4,  # Output file format
        mp4_file  # Output file
audio conversion settings:
'ffmpeg',
        -i, wav_file,  # Input file
        -vn,  # No video
        -ar, 90000,  # Sample rate
        -ac, 1,  # Audio channels
        -compression_level, 12,
        -c:a, flac,  # Codec audio flac
        flac_file  # Output file
